content: A very moving and powerful piece to which I can relate wholeheartedly and a theme about which I write my narratives and memoirs too. I am so glad you found refuge as I did eventually too, although in different ways, and how those experiences continue to grow through each day and each moment, healing healing healing those wounded memories until they transform into gratitude for the deep understanding they brought with them, the deepest realisations about just being. Thank you again, this for me is the best I have read of yours thus far.
